text: Nabii Ibraahim isi abbay korostah sugeh essere dambi-cabti kah tekkem mali, Nabii Ibraahim kaa kah xagniseh suge xagnih sabbat akke waytek, tokkel Nabii Ibraahim diggah isi abba Yallih qaduwwi kinniih korostah rabuwaam kaah baxxaqimte waqdi bari kaak yekkeeh dambi- cabti kaah esseraamak raaqeh, diggah Nabii Ibraahim Yallat kaxxam xaaqimaah nadaamitah, usuk kaal baaheenimil kaxxa xiqli kinni
